values:
I think I'm finally getting the hang of my zanpakutou, but not quite. <small>If Nii-sama were here, I'm sure he'd be able to get it in no time.</small>

Consider this my ten minute break.

Is it just me, or does anyone else feel overwhelmed whenever they get close to someone else?

So, um. If someone wants to fill me in, I'd... appreciate it.

A lot.
My alarm clock didn't set off this morning, so naturally I was late. I don't get it. Why didn't it go off when it's supposed to? I set it for six last night. Edit: It just went off, now. Stupid...
